name: Ball Rampage
description:
Controls: WASD to move.

In this game, you need to swing your ball around to kill enemies, collect points and get a Highscore! You have to maneuver in exactly the right way to hit the enemies exactly and dodge bullets!

This is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Thanks to Mark Brown for hosting this amazing jam! It's been so fun participating in my first one and the end result is something I'm actually really proud of!

Music: "Rhinoceros" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
